description:
Detect if user has data in clipboard, Google Tasks, Trello, or common formats and show 'Import your existing tasks' button with auto-detection of source format. Make onboarding instant for switchers.

**Rationale:** Users switching from other tools face migration friction. Smart import detection eliminates the blank slate problem and helps users transition seamlessly with their existing workflow.
title: Smart Import Suggestions in Empty State
